amendment.description: To establish the Senate Office of Public Integrity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3176 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 77.

action.text: Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2944. (consideration: CR S2440, S2441-2454, S2458-2459) To establish the Senate Office of Public Integrity.
